**OK, I rarely post on these threads, but today, I felt it was needed.**

First of all, this promotion doesn't start until "**11:59 PM PST on January 18th**", and for those of you that jumped the gun and already purchase RP, "**because of the advance notice, there will be no refunds for RP**".

Secondly, for those of you who plan on redeeming prepaid cards for RP or by purchasing through a mobile platform, "**Extra Bonus RP does not apply to mobile payment methods**" and "**Extra Bonus RP applies to prepaid cards (the $10 card is worth 1460 RP and the $25 card is worth 3750 RP) redeemed during the period**", meaning that only $10 and $25 cards are redeemable for this promotion.

PLEASE, just read the thread before you make any hasty decisions!
No. You might want to read that a little bit better. It says the promotion ENDS on the 18th.

"Extra Bonus RP applies to prepaid cards redeemed during the period."

OR, as the writer wrote,
 
"Extra Bonus RP applies to prepaid cards (the $10 card is worth 1460 RP and the $25 card is worth 3750 RP) redeemed during the period."

"Extra Bonus RP does not apply to mobile payment methods." Mobile payment methods? This is very vague, could it mean no cell-phones, tablets, laptops or even credit cards? 
Also, "There will be no refunds for RP purchases made prior to the announcement." Prior announcement? Where is this prior announcement?
"There will be no refunds for RP purchases made prior to the announcement or the promotion." What is "the promotion"?

This announcement is confusing. I think that the prepaid cards given in parenthesis are examples, but, they are not the only prepaid cards that can be used for the extra bonus RP; reason being, there are examples above for $35.00, $50.00, $20.00, and so forth...
If the two prepaid cards given in parenthesis are NOT examples BUT are the ONLY prepaid cards that can be used to receive extra bonus RP then this announcement is false advertisement, for, no where in the announcement does it say that these two prepaid cards are the only ones that can be used.

False Advertising is a crime.
Not precisely false advertising it seems; but the wording that was chosen doesn't seem to communicate exactly what they mean.  Riot really should take a look at their PR department.

The cards in parentheses are samples (the $25 card is not available in the client, but can be found in stores so we wanted to call it out) - in the future, are you hoping to see EVERYTHING listed out? Or is there another item you're referring to regarding "take a look at the PR department"?

I'm sure he meant that he wanted everything listed out. Even if all the other card amounts are included for the bonus (Which i'm sure they are) every other person in this thread seems to be using the fact that only the $10 and $25 cards were mentioned and so therefore they are the only cards that get the bonus.
